original_text: “I will make this city safe and I will rescue it. I will do that to show that I am great. I promised my servant David that I would do it. So I will do it.” ’ “I will make this city safe and I will rescue it. I will do that to show that I am great. I promised my servant David that I would do it. So I will do it.” ’ “I will make this city safe and I will rescue it.
korean_text: 내가 나와 나의 종 다윗을 위하여 이 성을 보호하여 구원하리라 하셨나이다 하였더라

sentences.original_text: I will make this city safe
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 이 도시를 안전하게 만들 것이다

sentences.original_text: to show that I am great
